thread.title: What people are saying after Panthers top Hawks
thread.title_full: What people are saying after Panthers top Hawks - seattlepi.com

author: ARI LILJENWALL, SEATTLEPI.COM
title: What people are saying after Panthers top Hawks
text:
Another week, another blown lead for the Seattle Seahawks.
After relinquishing fourth quarter leads in each of their first three losses against St. Louis, Green Bay and Cincinnati, Seattle was victimized by a late-game meltdown once again in Week 6, this time falling to the Carolina Panthers in a rare home defeat at CenturyLink Field. With the loss, the Seahawks dropped to 2-4 on the season and now have their work cut out for them if they want to work their way back into the NFC playoff picture.
Seattle's early-season struggles with finishing opponents have become the prevailing storyline surrounding the team thus far in 2015. Here's some of what our cohorts in the media are saying following the Seahawks' latest fourth-quarter meltdown.
